sourcesContent:
@if (!isDetails) {
{{dialogTitle}}
Name face @if (contactsForm?.get('name')?.hasError('required')) { Name is required }
Email email @if (contactsForm?.get('email')?.hasError('required') || contactsForm?.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Mobile smartphone @if (contactsForm?.get('mobile')?.hasError('required')) { Mobile is required }
Birth date @if (contactsForm?.get('birthDate')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Address
Note
} @if (isDetails) {
{{contacts.name}}
Friends
email
{{contacts.email}}
phonelink_ring

cake
{{contacts.birthDate | date: 'MMMM d, yyyy'}}
location_on
{{contacts.address}}
note
{{contacts.note}}
}
